website_summaries.verdict: Classic precision tweezers from a trusted brand updated with a luxurious rose goldtone look.
pros: Crafted at a 25-degree angle to perfectly oppose the brow bone
Slanted design ideal for plucking strays
cons: Edges are extremely sharp - take care not to nick yourself or slice off the hair rather than plucking it

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Tweezerman products! I have purchased many products from this company, due to the quality and craftsmanship. I wouldn’t even think of buying another brand of tweezers. This pair of tweezers, however, did not meet any sort of quality or craftsmanship! I wonder if they were knockoffs. They were not made in Germany. All of my other products are made there. Anyway, I totally agree with so many of the other reviewers! These did not tweeze anything! Mine were so bad that they didn’t even cut the hair off, as other reviewers stated. They just did nothing! These were returned. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: MAK

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: These tweezers arrived in a very nice plastic case and are stamped Tweezerman, but they are garbage. They cut hairs, not pull. I reported them as Defective and received a replacement. The replacement arrived in a ziploc baggie, are narrower and 3/4" shorter, and are not stamped Tweezerman. They are being returned for a refund as they are not what I ordered, despite what the label on the bag says.
customer_reviews.author: Scout88

customer_reviews.title: Genuine product. Plucks like a dream!
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the top reviews that say these tweezers are counterfeit. If you buy items that are fulfilled by Amazon, you shouldn't experience any problems with products being fake. I strictly purchase items with this label and have never had a fake product sent to me. For the cases where Amazon fulfillment is not an option, always read feedback from the third-party sellers to ensure their products don't have a history of being counterfeit. In other words, use common sense when making purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Wardrip

customer_reviews.title: Tweezerman what happened to your quality?
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. Have used Tweezerman Tweezers for decades. Suddenly (last couple I purchased) the quality has plummeted. No idea why. Wondering if the company was bought out or what. Finding decent tweezers is near impossible. Back to hunting.
customer_reviews.author: nancy j. martin

customer_reviews.title: So not Revlon :(
customer_reviews.text: Truly one of the most poorly made tweezers I have ever purchased. I lost my Revlon tweezers and was forced to buy a new pair. I read all of the reviews and decided on Tweezerman based upon the reviews that I read. I guess I should take the reviews with more than a grain of salt. These tweezers are extremely rough with sharp edges. They pull skin not just hair. There is absolutely no tension at the tweezer end. I miss my Revlon....
customer_reviews.author: pinktoys

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone far downhill
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these tweezers is so poor that I question the authenticity of the product. I have Tweezerman tweezers from 10 years ago that have a better grip. Also, Tweezerman used to offer a guarantee that they would sharpen any of their tweezers at no cost to the consumer and that is no longer available. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Missyhope

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Gold Color but not sharp
customer_reviews.text: Tweezerman usually is simply the best. The new rose gold color is lovely. However, these tweezers don't appear to be as sharp as previous new ones. I've tried cleaning them off to see if perhaps that would help, but they just don't seem to be as good as all my previous tweezerman tweezers. I understand Tweezerman has free sharpening services, so might consider just sending old ones back for sharpening.
customer_reviews.author: ECourt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tweezers!
customer_reviews.text: These tweezers are so precise and have a fine end. My last pair lasted over a decade without ever getting dull! I use these for everything from plucking my eyebrows and random facial hairs, to pulling out the tiniest of splinters in my fingers or feet. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sanaz

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THESE!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THESE!! I read some of the reviews saying these were FAKE and I took a chance anyway. I have been using Tweezerman for years and THESE ARE COMPLETELY DULL. NOT THE SAME!! The Tweezerman tweezers, same model, that I have loved to death and need to be sharpened are even sharper than these ones. I purchased the granite sky blue. The same style that I always get. COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY. They won't even pluck the easiest of hairs. I would probably be better off trying to pull the hair with my fingers. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Griswold

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Tweezer
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement to my last Tweezerman Tweezers. Works great. The only caveat is that they supposedly offer lifetime sharpening, however I sent my old one to them and never got it back, hence why the replacement. So just know there really isn't a warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Not The Good Quality I Normally Get From Tweezerman
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of tweezer man tweezers that I’ve had for a long time. I was getting a new pair for my daughter. These don’t feel as strong and heavy as the ones I have. They don’t pull hair out easily and they are not sharp and easy to use as my pair. Honestly, they don’t seem like they were even manufactured by the same company.
customer_reviews.author: Pink4us

customer_reviews.title: Get them, you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best tweezers I have ever had. I lost my last pair and jumped online to order a new pair. I’ve used these for...10 years almost and I will never stray from them. These last forever and they are SO. GOOD. They get hairs you didn’t know you had and can grab splinters so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Merk

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as my less expensive pair
customer_reviews.text: These are not as good as Zizzili surgical grade stainless steel tweezers which are less expensive. That is the brand I’ve been using and decided to try Tweezerman for my nasty hard to pluck hairs. My Zizzilis are still better!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: will never buy another tweezer brand again
customer_reviews.text: honestly thought these wouldn’t be worth the hype bc WHY are they so expensive. But after spending money of several cheap tweezers only to be disappointed (and have my husband complain) I caved. these are magical and I completely understand what the hype and price is all about
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Metal is weak/ no tension
customer_reviews.text: Good Tweezers are hard to find... I’ve always bought tweezerman because it’s a dependable brand and yet I am incredibly disappointed. I just opened these and as soon as I held it between my fingers I felt the lack of tension between the points. It’s as though the metal is not strong but frail. Because the metal is not strong it does not grin hair well. I have course thick hair so it’s not like it’s trying to pull thin hair.... my hair should help the product but there is not enough tension. There goes money down the drain because I can’t even return them. I’m so bummed
customer_reviews.author: Joel Tefft

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone down the toilet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my tweezerman tweezers that I left while on vacation. My original pair were purchased almost 10 years ago and still plucked hairs like a pro. These tweezers cut the hair rather than plucking it about 50% of the time and they're very flimsy. My crappy pair or revlon tweezers are sturdier than these, they bend when the two sides are pushed together. Time to look for another brand of tweezers.
customer_reviews.author: ariel wright

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my treatment room. Expecting it to work just fine, because what could possibly be wrong with a pair of tweezers, right? Well as I was about to clean up my client's brows and try to tweeze. The tweezers from "Tweezerman" which are know to be good, don't grab or tweeze any single hair I try. I was embarrassed in front of my client that my tweezers were faulty. Luckily I had a back up! Was going to return, but returns aren't accepted. Sincerely, Very disappointed customer
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Tweezerman Quality Has Gone Way Down
customer_reviews.text: These tweezers are so-so. I previously owned two pair (which are over 10 years old) and they were working well. I lost a pair so I purchased a replacement and they work very poorly. I also purchased a nail clipper set and my cheap drug store clippers work better.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann C. Trozzo

customer_reviews.title: I love these tweezers
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd pair that I have owned and they are the best tweezers I have ever bought. I have 3 other brands and they are junk compared to these. I have to pluck my eyebrows everyday and these are the best for doing this. I love can't say enough good things about them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are ok...
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to finally have a pair of Tweezermans, but these are a bit too sharp edged for me. I have had a couple of "nics" when plucking. I will continue to use them on longer brow growth in hopes that the sharpness dulls down a bit with time and use.
customer_reviews.author: Norma H. Noriega

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not perfect, But, Very good... Doesn't grab hair great... Have to keep trying, but, grabs and pulls out, eventually...
customer_reviews.author: Lon Jones

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These tweezers are poorly made and cut you often. I have been doing my own eyebrows for the last 25 years and never have I pinched/cut myself as much as I have as with these tweezers. It's like a badly made knife.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these tweezers! I have 3 pairs (in 3 different places) and they can get hairs my cheaper tweezers would miss! I haven't had to have them sharpened yet but having Tweezerman do it for life is a great benefit!
customer_reviews.author: A. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Best tweezers ever!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used tweezers for years. The tweezers are thin, slip in your fingers, and can barely grab your hairs. Not these tweezers though, they are wise and easy to pinch, and they grab hairs and don’t let go. Pay the price it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Spell

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is now the only brand of tweezers i will buy. Cant go back to an inferior prouduct. I have a pair from probably 10+ years ago, and wanted another for my travel case too. Love love love
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth F.

customer_reviews.title: Best tweezers ever
customer_reviews.text: Best tweezers ever. I've used tweezers from dollar stores for years. If I knew then, what I know now.. I would have gone with the tweezerman FIRST. It seriously makes a difference when you've been using cheap ones for years. Also love the colors they come in and excellent price
customer_reviews.author: autumn

customer_reviews.title: Good Old Fashioned Craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Tweezerman makes great tweezers and I wouldn't buy anything else they're so well made. This particular size of Tweezerman is great but I love the little tiny Tweezerman tweezers best because they fit great in my small hand and the little reusable storage tube they come in keeps them upright in my medicine cabinet. I can easily find them amongst all the other stuff in there. Can't say enough good things about Tweezerman products -- I also bought a fingernail brush from them and it's great too.
customer_reviews.author: TwoCentsTomlinsonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: German company but made in India
customer_reviews.text: I had very high expectations with this item. Unfortunately, this pair of tweezers is horrible made. They are dull and have a terrible grip. I am returning them and hope to find something better.
customer_reviews.author: MDDM

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good tweezers and at a more fair price than at the department stores. Be careful because the blades are sharp but that’s what I like with my tweezers. The color is also appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Rae

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: These are counterfeit. The real ones in the picture are the green ones and they say LTD Tweezerman and are trademarked. On tweezerman.com site which I just looked up the tweezers sell for $25. I'll only buy my tweezers directly from that site.
customer_reviews.author: Alayna Descalzo

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: I've read in various beauty posts that these tweezers are the best, however, mine are scratchy, like they aren't completely smooth. They still work, but I am disappointed since they were way expensive compared to previous tweezers I have purchased and used for years.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best tweezers I’ve ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Best tweezers I’ve ever used! They grasp every eyebrow hair much easier than any other tweezers I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Tweezerman ftw
customer_reviews.text: I only use tweezerman tweezers. These things are great. They pluck even the most deep rooted of hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Hairs Can't Hide
customer_reviews.text: These are a cut above the common chrome-plated (eventually rusty) tweezers available at grocery and drug stores. First off, these are NOT going to rust! I have YET to have a hair slip through the pincers! They grab with very little effort. They are very comfortable since they are nicely wide where you hold them. I especially like the rubber tip-cover that keep the tips from getting dinged. Yes, they are a bit pricey but I really feel it's an investment. Take care of them and you will have them for a very long time. I'm very happy I purchased these.
customer_reviews.author: Chibikabra

customer_reviews.title: Trusted brand
customer_reviews.text: Tweezerman has always been one of my favorite brands of personal care tools. This tweezer has not disappointed me.
customer_reviews.author: Rapunzel

customer_reviews.title: Used tweezers disgusting
customer_reviews.text: I received these tweezers used!!! There was blood and a hair despite it being “taped” closed! Disgusting so disappointed in Amazon!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Butterfieldaimek

customer_reviews.title: still the best
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with Tweezerman, although I notice a definitive difference since production was moved away from EU to India. I tried others, went back to Tweezerman. They last so long, the only reason I have to replace them is because everyone else likes them! They keep disappearing.
customer_reviews.author: CK WOOD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for people with normal hair
customer_reviews.text: I do my own eyebrows and that is why I bought this product. I have thick hair so this was an okay product for me. I like the color and it is sharp! I believe this product would work best for all people with normal or fine hair just not me. More importantly, it is a much better tweezer than the ones you find in local stores like Wal-mart or Walgreens. I don't regret my purchase it works fine but it is not perfect. I am still looking for my perfect Tweezer (this will do for the meantime).
customer_reviews.author: N. Riaz

customer_reviews.title: Not effective for pulling facial hair
customer_reviews.text: These tweezers are not good at grasping and holding hairs for pulling. Don't buy if you're using them for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Tim in Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the best tweezers!!
customer_reviews.text: The first tweezers I've ever had that pluck even the most fine hairs. Also, other tweezers I've had would stop gripping after using a few times. I am so happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Starr

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and sharp
customer_reviews.text: I love this rose gold one. I think it’s cheaper than the rest of them too. I’ve now bought two.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Work “ok” but have had higher quality from Tweezerman in the past
customer_reviews.text: Look nice but can be difficult to use. Half the time they cut or rip the hairs instead of gripping and pulling hairs. I have the mini rose gold tweezer set from Tweezerman and they work much better. A little disappointed with these larger ones.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Cohen

customer_reviews.title: I love these tweezers!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how much better they are but they get every little hair no matter how small it is!
customer_reviews.author: Martin Sevillano

customer_reviews.title: NOT ALL TWEEZERMAN TWEEZERS ARE CREATED EQUAL!
customer_reviews.text: Although I believe Tweezerman makes the best tweezer products, I've found that the quality of each tweezer utensil varies greatly. I must buy at least three or four, in order to find one that really performs well. Further, as I use the product, it loses its ability to "grab" a hair. Further, Tweezerman no longer offers to sharpen the tips. Please advise me as to how to have the tips sharpened, so that I don't need to spend a small fortune on tweezers!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Septimus

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tweezers. Would buy again and as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Catherine T. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Tweezers
customer_reviews.text: Tweezing can be fun again. Precise and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: These tweezers actually work!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been so frustrated trying to find tweezers that work. These are so great! I’m so glad I bought these. I was skeptical because I’ve had so much trouble. These definitely work! Pluck from the root. Don’t slip! Pull the whole hair!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G.

customer_reviews.title: Tweezerman Slant Tweezers
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of buying crappy cheap tweezers over the years and decided to try a pair of Tweezerman. These tweezers have a very fit and finish and work great.
customer_reviews.author: 51plymouth

customer_reviews.title: Typically Tweezerman is the best when it comes to cosmetic tweezers but what I ...
customer_reviews.text: Typically Tweezerman is the best when it comes to cosmetic tweezers but what I got was far from the best. Not only is the tip filed poorly, but it does not tweeze the fine hairs like other Tweezerman tweezers I've purchased at beauty stores. It's almost like it was previously used or one of the rejects, not a brand new one.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great tweezers at a better price
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent tweezers. Nice machined tips, good resistance, good size. At my local pharmacy these exact tweezers were nearly 30 dollars, I’m much happier buying them here!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan B.

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Durable. I've had this item for over 2 years and performs well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lostcase

customer_reviews.title: Great tweezers
customer_reviews.text: My go to tweezers. Stay sharp for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: Too sharp for their own good
customer_reviews.text: These tweezers are so incredibly sharp that instead of grasping the hair to be tweezed, it cuts it clean off. Not helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Dblaire

customer_reviews.title: Still the best tweezers for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Tweezerman tweezers are my personal favorite.Sharp enough to grab small hairs,last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Aubree

customer_reviews.title: I love these tweezers
customer_reviews.text: Lost my last ones. I love these tweezers... the last ones I had were same brand and they lasted 20 years... until my 12 year old lost them.
customer_reviews.author: Tootsie

customer_reviews.title: Very dull!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed in these tweezers. This is the second pair and they’re just dull! They don’t grab well at all! I should have sent them back but my time expired. My fault. I have always bought this brand and never experienced anything like this but these are terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Julie S

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Repeat purchase and only because I lost the others while on travel. They hold up well and I appreciate the manufactuer’s sharpening service.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: best tweezers of all time
customer_reviews.text: people who don’t understand the difference between drug store $2 tweezers and Tweezerman are the people who need to buy these. every hair you grab will come out without slipping. fine hairs aren’t a problem either - best tweezers i’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: but for the price it's pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: The edges are so sharp that it often cuts hairs when I try to pull them out. Hopefully it fills out a bit so it's more effective, but for the price it's pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: bookwormcutie

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed, as it did not pull out hairs easily
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews prior to buying, but should of listened more to the once indicating that this tweezer was not very effective. I was disappointed, as it did not pull out hairs easily, but rather cut the hair. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: V. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: These are worse than my 20 yr old tweezerman slant tweezers and the $3 ones I bought from Brandless. Not sure if the brand has decayed or the ones I got were just useless.
customer_reviews.author: AmHon

customer_reviews.title: Great tweezers
customer_reviews.text: Works well even with thin tiny hairs. A little bigger than what I expected including the tip size. Just a little smaller and it would be perfect for me. Still, it does what it's supposed to do very well.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Durable and long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: Tweezerman tweezers are the best. I only have to replace them every 2 to 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand and I love the rose gold color.
customer_reviews.author: dionne

customer_reviews.title: Not as good a tool as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Ends are too sharp. Not as good a tool as I thought it would be..
customer_reviews.author: mamal

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: Having tried a number of tweezers over the years, I think Tweezerman is the best. Hairs don't slip through like on so many other products.
customer_reviews.author: WLM

customer_reviews.title: Very precise.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as i opened it, My little one got a splinter and these came in handy! Easy to use. Splinter cane right out.
customer_reviews.author: Dianka Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Nice sharp edge
customer_reviews.text: My husband sneaks these out of my makeup bag frequently, so my Tweezerman slant gets double the use. Holding up just fine, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Haggis

customer_reviews.title: What happened to the quality of this product?
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased Tweezerman products before and was thoroughly impressed. However, when I received this product, it was nothing like the Tweezerman products that I had purchased from Target. Guess I'll go back to target!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Tips don't align precisely
customer_reviews.text: Somehow, unlike my previous tweezerman tweezer purchases these are not perfectly aligned.
customer_reviews.author: Betsysdimples

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR THE PRICE, LOW SPRING TENSION
customer_reviews.text: SHARP, BUT NOT A LOT OF RESISTANCE AGAINST YOUR FINGERS. THEY SLIP OUT EASILY. I USE THEM FOR REMOVING SLIVERS, AND I NEED TO SEPERATE SKIN WITH THE SPRING ACTION, WHICH IS MINIMAL ON THESE COMPARED TO MY OLD MODEL.
customer_reviews.author: ZX

customer_reviews.title: Best tweezer ever!! Love this brand!!
customer_reviews.text: Best tweezers ever!!! Have several pair all over the house & in the car. Love the slant tip. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy L Tighe

customer_reviews.title: Effective and efficient at getting job done
customer_reviews.text: Ends aren't too thick and they grab hair on first attempt. That's all I ask of tweezers and these do the trick!
customer_reviews.author: cmc83

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This are great quality. I will enjoy using them..... until I lose them and need another pair. 😬
customer_reviews.author: JHM

customer_reviews.title: ... bought these because I wanted to invest in some good tweezers instead of the drug store brand ones I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I wanted to invest in some good tweezers instead of the drug store brand ones I had been using. While I might try to find another brand to spend money on, these were terrible. The tips were so sharp that instead of pulling out any hairs they just clipped them, leaving behind a tiny hair that I couldn't grab onto. I returned these after a few days because I got so fed up. If you're looking to invest, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K Griepentrog

customer_reviews.title: Always a favorite - great workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Always a favorite - great workmanship, always precision filed, and gets hairs I can't see but can feel. Will always re-order even if the price goes up. They just work!
customer_reviews.author: kbs

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Only tweezer brand I use. They’re great and last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tweezerman tweezers are the best that I've used
customer_reviews.text: Tweezerman tweezers are the best that I've used. They are very precise and can get hairs other tweezers can't.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Bogden

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality But It Needs A Case.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality steel and a tight squeeze when tweezed. For the price, it needs a protective case to keep it in but it does not.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Davis

customer_reviews.title: These feel loose
customer_reviews.text: These feel loose for some reason. Then don’t seem to clamp too tightly. I don’t know if it’s just my pair but I have other tweezerman tweezers that work fine but rarely use these.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Ends of the tweezer are much thicker and much less precise than Teeezerman utensil I purchased years ago. Not sure if this was a second or the quality of Tweerzerman has just gone down that much. Very unimpressive tweezers.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Sun Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Good value have used tweezer for as long as I remember
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ita

customer_reviews.title: Bought & Returned
customer_reviews.text: Not working like normal Tweezerman’s. Not sure why they seem super dull. Going to Harmon!
customer_reviews.author: meghan n naso

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: These grab and don't let go. My only problem is that they are so sharp, at times they cut the hair before I can pull! Very good tweezers, though.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia F. Grunwaldt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent you will love these!
customer_reviews.text: I am a cosmetologist and these are one of the best. You won't regret buying these. If you take good care of them they should be the last ones you will purchase for a free years. I lost my other ones ... or i think they walked away into some wondering hands. Will order again !!! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: L in Florida

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: These tweezers are the best I've had! They grip well and are user-friendly. Great Choice!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Quality made tweezers
customer_reviews.text: Tweezerman does make quality personal grooming items. These tweezers certainly reflect that. Buy a pair and see for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: JGofT

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Tweezers grab tiny hairs well. Seems well made. Nice plastic tip protector. Hope they last many years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Tweezerman, that's all you need to know.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality I've come to love and expect from Tweezerman.
customer_reviews.author: Leyla

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this item as a gift for my mother ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a gift for my mother. These are the only tweezers that work! They stay sharp for a long time without being so sharp they cut off the hair you are trying to pluck- I would give more stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Amber B

customer_reviews.title: My favorite tweezers
customer_reviews.text: I misplaced the Tweezerman I had been using for 10 years, and glad to be getting another one -- better than any other tweezers I've ever used on my eyebrows. I have thin hair, and these work great.
customer_reviews.author: NancyM

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Tweezerman tweezers are the best. It is the only brand I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lj from Fl

customer_reviews.title: The holy grail of tweezers!
customer_reviews.text: Tweezerman has never disappointed. Their tweezers are well made and this pair is no exception. Gets every hair every time!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: I was led to believe these were great tweezers. They're not
customer_reviews.text: I was led to believe these were great tweezers. They're not! Totally average! No better than the $2.99 tweezers from my local drugstore. Very disappointed in this over priced product.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rufkahr

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money...
customer_reviews.text: I went through a couple of $5 tweezers from Rite-Aid and similar stores but man do they suck. This product is great because the tips actually stay touching each other after many uses, so that it can pull fine hairs out with ease. There are some better tweezers out there but it's really expensive at ~$50 so I'm content with these. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Y.

customer_reviews.title: BEST
customer_reviews.text: Do not try to save money and go with similar brand ... THIS ARE THE ONES. Wasted money on 2 other pairs before these.
customer_reviews.author: Amuze-ing

customer_reviews.title: ... used Tweezerman brand tweezers for years and they never disappoint. This was a good price too
customer_reviews.text: I have used Tweezerman brand tweezers for years and they never disappoint. This was a good price too, the last pair I got was $25, Amazon has a much better price.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Harris

customer_reviews.title: Ok but I prefer the shorter Tweezerman tweezers for pulling hairs easily.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely finding that I prefer the shorter version of Tweezerman tweezers--more effective at pulling hairs which is my primary use for these.
customer_reviews.author: Jandercol

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend it! So dull!
customer_reviews.text: So dull that doesn’t pull any hair out! Waste of money! I wish if I could return it back!
customer_reviews.author: Reyhaneh

customer_reviews.title: Good pair of tweezers
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of tweezers. They always work so well and this product was no different.
customer_reviews.author: RT
